div.class: wpb_column vc_column_container vc_col-sm-12 vc_col-lg-2 vc_col-md-4 vc_col-has-fill

div.p: DIRECTORY
Get in touch with us
#EUHSDStrong

On every campus, including Escondido, Orange Glen, San Pasqual, Valley or Del Lago Academy, you will find a unique learning environment in which students can truly thrive. With nationally recognized Advanced Placement courses, College & Career Technical Education, Independent Study, after school enrichment, career exploration, STEM and more, opportunities are abundant.

div.class: vc_row wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_custom_1586378395996 vc_row-has-fill vc_column-gap-30 vc_row-o-equal-height vc_row-flex

img.alt: EUHSD School Board Workshop
EUHSD School Board Meeting
EUHSD School Board Meeting
EUHSD School Board Meeting

blockquote.p: Congratulations to our EUHSD Teachers of the Year 2020!

img.alt: EUHSD Shout Out! EHS Staff Member
EUHSD Shout Out! Kevin Myers, SPHS Assistant Principal

div.p: For over 125 years, Escondido Union High School District has inspired, empowered and educated students helping them prepare for a bright future. Beyond their high school days, graduates from all EUHSD schools have gone on to complete extraordinary achievements. Many have made exemplary contributions in their professions, impacted the lives of others, obtained commendable notoriety or earned notable awards in medicine, the military, athletics, science, music, the arts and other fields.

img.alt: EUHSD Distinguished Alumni Alexa Melgoza Photo
EUHSD Distinguished Alumni Teri McKeever Photo

div.br:
302 North Midway Drive
(CLICK for Directions)
Escondido, CA 92027
(760) 291-3200
Office Hours:
Monday - Friday
7:30 am - 4:30 pm

section.div:
Escondido Union High School District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation, and bullying based on actual or perceived ancestry, age, color, disability, gender, gender identity, gender expression, nationality, race or ethnicity, religion, sex, sexual orientation, pregnancy, marital or parental status or association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics. (EUHSD BP 0410, BP/AR 5145.3, BP/AR 4030, BP 5131.2)
Dr. Olga West, Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources
Equity and Title IX Compliance Officer
302 N. Midway Drive, Escondido, CA 92027
Office: (760)291-3281
Email: owest@euhsd.org

div.p: View detailed information about our educational program in the Course Catalog. Select the course title for specific information about each course, including descriptions and requirements.

div.p: For a list of courses and to view the associated units and descriptions visit our EUHSD Adopted Curriculum page for our Curriculum Guides
